name: MessianicPerspectives
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: messianic perspectives
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to down-to-earth Bible teaching from a distinctive first-century Jewish point of view. Dr. Gary Hedrick has been president of CJF Ministries (CJFM) in San Antonio, Texas, since August of 1988. 

Once enabled, you can listen to the most recent episode by saying, "Alexa, play Messianic Perspectives"

To pause or resume any episode, say "Alexa, pause" or "Alexa, resume." To listen to previous episodes, say "Alexa, play the previous episode." If you want to know the title of an episode while the episode is playing, say "Alexa, ask Messianic Perspectives for the title of this episode." If you want to know the air date of an episode, say "Alexa, ask Messianic Perspectives for the date of this episode."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
